item.description:
There are now THREE ways to vote in this straw poll:

1. Vote online now at this link: http://www.ctgop.org/2012/01/ct-gop-announc...

2. Nuchies Restaurant, 164 Central Street, Bristol, CT 1/20/12 6:00 pm-9:00 pm

3. Grassroots East “Honor the Candidates” Dinner, Holiday Inn, 10 Laura Blvd, Norwich, CT 1/20/12 6:00 pm-9:00 pm You can RSVP here: http://grassrootseast.org/

Ballots are $20 at the first two events. It will cost $35 for the Grassroots East event if you RSVP in advance (includes dinner - and a registration form), or $40 at the door. It's unclear if the Grassroots East event $35/$40 fee includes the cost of the ballot, or not.

Both the Bristol event and the Norwich event will include a presentation in support of the candidates.

Just a reminder - stay in campaign mode. Be polite.
item.name: Bristol CT GOP Republican Party Straw Poll - 2 locations
